channel.title: kheer on Maiche Jewan
channel.description: Recent content in kheer on Maiche Jewan

item.title: Semolina (Rava) Kheer
item.description: Ingredients : 1 cup semolina (rava) 3 tbsp sugar 2 tbsp, ghee (clarified butter) 1 1⁄2 ltd, full cream / whole milk 200g condensed milk 150g fresh cream 1⁄2 cup dry fruits (almonds, pistachios, cashew nuts), crushed coarsely 2 tbsp raisins (for garnishing) 1 tsp vanilla (food flavour) 1⁄2 tsp Kewra water (food flavour) Method: Add ghee to a pan and fry semolina on low heat, stirring constantly to avoid burning.
